jdbcService.sql: update ~node_attachments set modified = :modified, parent_id = :parentId, type = :type, sub_type = :subType, size = :size, width = :width, height = :height, name = :name, title = :title, description = :description, uri = :uri, external = :external, language_id = :languageId, attachment_group_id = :attachmentGroupId, meta = :meta, owner_id = :ownerId, priority = :priority, node_id = :nodeId where id = :id
